long_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece that reverses to a wind-resistant shell, the sumptuous women's Patagonia Los Lobos vest boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so you stay comfortable in cool weather. Reverse the vest to a recycled ripstop shell for added versatility; shell side of vest features a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light moisture. Los Lobos vest features taffeta trim at the front zipper and pockets. Front princess seaming lends a contoured fit. Cozy hand pockets are lined with brushed tricot. The women's Patagonia Los Lobos vest offers a hip-length, relaxed fit.
short_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece that reverses to a wind-resistant shell, the sumptuous women's Patagonia Los Lobos vest boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets.
